00014    class GeneratorManual

00016       public const string MAINMETHOD = "Main";

00018       private List<TreeNode> types = new List<TreeNode>();
00019       private List<UserType> usertypes = new List<UserType>();
00020       private List<TypeBuilder> allTypes = new List<TypeBuilder>();
00021       private ModuleBuilder mb;
00022       private AssemblyBuilder ab;

00029       public GeneratorManual(ModuleBuilder mb, AssemblyBuilder ab)
00030       {
00031          this.mb = mb;
00032          this.ab = ab;

00038       public List<TypeBuilder> AllTypes
00039       {
00040          get { return allTypes; }
00041       }

00047       public void WalkTypes(TreeNode node)
00048       {
00049          // manually traverse the AST so we can first define all classes before references to them are made
00050          foreach (TreeNode n in node.Children)
00051          {
00052             if (n.Type == VnvdGenerator.NAMESPACE)
00053             {
00054                foreach (TreeNode n2 in n.Children)
00055                {
00056                   if (n2.Entry != null && n2.EntryType == EntryType.Class)
00057                   {
00058                      UserType t = (UserType)n2.Entry.ReflectionObject;
00059                      n2.Entry.ReflectionObject = DefineClass(t.FullName, t.Attributes);
00060                      ((UserType) t.MakeArrayType()).Entry.ReflectionObject =
00061                         ((TypeBuilder) n2.Entry.ReflectionObject).MakeArrayType();
00062                      usertypes.Add(t);
00063                      types.Add(n2);
00064                   }
00065                   else if (n2.Entry != null && n2.EntryType == EntryType.Interface)
00066                   {
00067                      UserType t = (UserType)n2.Entry.ReflectionObject;
00068                      n2.Entry.ReflectionObject = DefineInterface(t.FullName, t.Attributes);
00069                      ((UserType)t.MakeArrayType()).Entry.ReflectionObject =
00070                         ((TypeBuilder)n2.Entry.ReflectionObject).MakeArrayType();
00071                      usertypes.Insert(0, t);
00072                      types.Insert(0, n2);
00073                   }
00074                   else if (n2.Entry != null && n2.EntryType == EntryType.Enum)
00075                   {
00076                      UserEnum t = (UserEnum)n2.Entry.ReflectionObject;
00077                      n2.Entry.ReflectionObject = DefineEnum(t.FullName, t.Attributes);
00078                      ((UserType)t.MakeArrayType()).Entry.ReflectionObject =
00079                         ((TypeBuilder)n2.Entry.ReflectionObject).MakeArrayType();
00080                      usertypes.Insert(0, t);
00081                      types.Insert(0, n2);
00082                   }
00083                }
00084             }
00085          }
00086       }
00087 
00091       public void WalkTypeMembers()
00092       {
00093 
00094          // now define all methods and fields of the classes
00095          int interfaces = 0;
00096          Dictionary<TypeBuilder, UserType> hasConstructors = new Dictionary<TypeBuilder, UserType>();
00097 
00098          for (int i = 0; i < types.Count; i++)
00099          {
00100             TreeNode n = types[i];
00101             UserType customType = usertypes[i];
00102             TypeBuilder tb = (TypeBuilder)n.Entry.ReflectionObject;
00103             Type b;
00104             if (customType.BaseType is UserType)
00105                b = (Type)((UserType)customType.BaseType).Entry.ReflectionObject;
00106             else
00107                b = customType.BaseType;
00108 
00109             if (!tb.IsInterface)
00110                tb.SetParent(b);
00111             
00112             foreach (Type t in customType.GetDirectInterfaces())
00113             {
00114                tb.AddInterfaceImplementation(t);
00115             }
00116 
00117             int index = allTypes.IndexOf(tb.BaseType as TypeBuilder);
00118             if (index != -1 && index > allTypes.IndexOf(tb))
00119             {
00120                TypeBuilder tb2 = (TypeBuilder)tb.BaseType;
00121                allTypes.Remove(tb2);
00122                allTypes.Insert(allTypes.IndexOf(tb), tb2);
00123             }
00124             else if (tb.IsInterface && tb.GetInterfaces().Length > 0 && allTypes.IndexOf(tb.GetInterfaces()[0] as TypeBuilder) > allTypes.IndexOf(tb))
00125             {
00126                TypeBuilder tb2 = (TypeBuilder)tb.GetInterfaces()[0];
00127                allTypes.Remove(tb2);
00128                allTypes.Insert(allTypes.IndexOf(tb), tb2);
00129                interfaces++;
00130             }
00131             else if (tb.IsInterface)
00132             {
00133                allTypes.Remove(tb);
00134                allTypes.Insert(interfaces, tb);
00135                interfaces++;
00136             }
00137 
00138             Boolean hasConstructor = false;
00139             int enumCount = 0;
00140             foreach (TreeNode n2 in n.Children)
00141             {
00142                if (n2.Type == VnvdGenerator.FIELD)
00143                {
00144                   UserField uf = (UserField)n2.Entry.ReflectionObject;
00145                   n2.Entry.ReflectionObject = DefineField(tb, uf.Name, uf.Attributes, uf.FieldType);
00146                }
00147                else if (n2.Type == VnvdGenerator.CONSTRUCTOR)
00148                {
00149                   hasConstructor = true;
00150                   UserConstructor uf = (UserConstructor)n2.Entry.ReflectionObject;
00151                   n2.Entry.ReflectionObject = DefineConstructor(tb, uf.Attributes, uf.GetParameters());
00152                }
00153                else if (n2.Type == VnvdGenerator.METHOD)
00154                {
00155                   UserMethod uf = (UserMethod)n2.Entry.ReflectionObject;
00156                   n2.Entry.ReflectionObject = DefineMethod(tb, uf.Name, uf.Attributes, uf.ReturnType, uf.GetParameters());
00157                }
00158                else if (n2.Type == VnvdGenerator.IMETHOD)
00159                {
00160                   UserMethod uf = (UserMethod)n2.Entry.ReflectionObject;
00161                   n2.Entry.ReflectionObject = DefineMethod(tb, uf.Name, uf.Attributes, uf.ReturnType, uf.GetParameters());
00162                }
00163                else if (n2.Type == VnvdGenerator.SCONSTRUCTOR)
00164                {
00165                   //UserConstructor uf = (UserConstructor)n2.Entry.ReflectionObject;
00166                   n2.Entry.ReflectionObject = tb.DefineTypeInitializer();
00167                }
00168                else if (n2.Type == VnvdGenerator.ENUMOPTION)
00169                {
00170                   UserField uf = (UserField)n2.Entry.ReflectionObject;
00171                   FieldBuilder fb = tb.DefineField(uf.Name, tb, FieldAttributes.Literal | FieldAttributes.Static | FieldAttributes.Public);
00172                   n2.Entry.ReflectionObject = fb;
00173                   fb.SetConstant(enumCount);
00174                   enumCount++;
00175                }
00176             }
00177             if (tb.IsClass && !tb.IsEnum && !hasConstructor)
00178             {
00179                hasConstructors[tb] = customType;
00180             }
00181          }
00182 
00183          foreach (TypeBuilder t in allTypes)
00184          {
00185             if (hasConstructors.ContainsKey(t))
00186             {
00187                UserConstructor uc = (UserConstructor)hasConstructors[t].GetConstructor(new Type[] { });
00188                UserType baset = FindUserType(hasConstructors[t].BaseType);
00189                ConstructorInfo baseConstructor;
00190                if (baset == null)
00191                {
00192                   baseConstructor = hasConstructors[t].BaseType.GetConstructor(new Type[] { });
00193                }
00194                else
00195                {
00196                   baseConstructor = baset.GetConstructor(new Type[] { });
00197                   baseConstructor = (ConstructorInfo)((UserConstructor)baseConstructor).Entry.ReflectionObject;
00198                }
00199                ConstructorBuilder cb = DefineConstructor(t,
00200                                                          MethodAttributes.Public | MethodAttributes.HideBySig |
00201                                                          MethodAttributes.SpecialName | MethodAttributes.RTSpecialName,
00202                                                          new ParameterInfo[] {});
00203                ILGenerator ig = cb.GetILGenerator();
00204                ig.Emit(OpCodes.Call, baseConstructor);
00205                ig.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);
00206                uc.Entry.ReflectionObject = cb;
00207             }
00208          }
00209       }
00210 
00211       private UserType FindUserType(Type tb)
00212       {
00213          foreach (UserType t in usertypes)
00214          {
00215             if (t.FullName.Equals(tb.FullName))
00216                return t;
00217          }
00218          return null;
00219       }
00220 
00221       private ConstructorBuilder DefineConstructor(TypeBuilder type, MethodAttributes attr, ParameterInfo[] parameters)
00222       {
00223          Type[] pars = new Type[parameters.Length];
00224          for (int i = 0; i < parameters.Length; i++)
00225          {
00226             pars[i] = parameters[i].ParameterType;
00227          }
00228          ConstructorBuilder cb = type.DefineConstructor(attr, CallingConventions.HasThis, pars);
00229 
00230          for (int i = 0; i < parameters.Length; i++)
00231          {
00232             cb.DefineParameter(i + 1, parameters[i].Attributes, parameters[i].Name);
00233          }
00234 
00235          ILGenerator ig = cb.GetILGenerator();
00236          ig.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0);
00237 
00238          return cb;
00239       }
00240 
00241       private FieldBuilder DefineField(TypeBuilder type, String name, FieldAttributes attr, Type _return)
00242       {
00243          return type.DefineField(name, _return, attr);
00244       }
00245 
00246       private MethodBuilder DefineMethod(TypeBuilder type, String name, MethodAttributes attr, Type _return, ParameterInfo[] parameters)
00247       {
00248          Type[] pars = new Type[parameters.Length];
00249          for (int i = 0; i < parameters.Length; i++)
00250          {
00251             pars[i] = parameters[i].ParameterType;
00252          }
00253          MethodBuilder metb = type.DefineMethod(name, attr, _return, pars);
00254 
00255          for (int i = 0; i < parameters.Length; i++)
00256          {
00257             metb.DefineParameter(i + 1, parameters[i].Attributes, parameters[i].Name);
00258          }
00259 
00260          if (name.Equals(MAINMETHOD) && _return == typeof(void) && (parameters.Length == 0 || (parameters.Length == 1 && parameters[0].ParameterType == typeof(String[]))))
00261          {
00262             ab.SetEntryPoint(metb);
00263          }
00264 
00265          return metb;
00266       }
00267 
00268       private TypeBuilder DefineClass(String name, TypeAttributes attr)
00269       {
00270          TypeBuilder tb = mb.DefineType(name, attr);
00271          allTypes.Add(tb);
00272 
00273          return tb;
00274       }
00275 
00276       private TypeBuilder DefineInterface(String name, TypeAttributes attr)
00277       {
00278          TypeBuilder tb = mb.DefineType(name, attr);
00279          allTypes.Add(tb);
00280 
00281          return tb;
00282       }
00283 
00284       private TypeBuilder DefineEnum(String name, TypeAttributes attr)
00285       {
00286          TypeBuilder enu = mb.DefineType(name, attr, typeof(Enum));
00287          allTypes.Add(enu);
00288 
00289          enu.DefineField(UserEnum.VALUE, typeof (int),
00290                          FieldAttributes.SpecialName | FieldAttributes.RTSpecialName | FieldAttributes.Public);
00291          return enu;
00292       }
00293    }
